Header.title: Introducing Innovative Products, Tailored for You
Header.paragraph: JMa Import & Export LLC was founded by Marta Santana and Juan Ramos with focus on developing products in South Florida market. We have over 20 years of experience in the market of Fast Moving Consumer Goods. We offer products, especially customised for the South Florida market.

About.paragraph: We are a small company based in South Florida. Our mission is to bring products of high quality at affordable prices so consumers can enjoy quality products without hurting their pockets. We have been open since 2016 and could not be more thankful of the support of the community. We have been lucky enough to work with incredible partners that have made our journey more enjoyable.
